TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlArrayAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定 必须将特定的类成员序列化为 XML 元素的数组。

span.span: Specifies that the must serialize a particular class member as an array of XML elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属于一系列属性，用于控制如何序列化或反序列化对象。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object. 类似的属性的完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md). 你可以将应用到返回的对象数组的公共字段或读/写属性。You can apply the to a public field or read/write property that returns an array of objects. 此外可以将其应用于集合和返回的字段或任何返回的字段实现的对象接口。You can also apply it to collections and fields that return an or any field that returns an object that implements the interface. 当你将类成员，方法类从该成员生成嵌套的 XML 元素序列。When you apply the to a class member, the method of the class generates a nested sequence of XML elements from that member. XML 架构文档 （.xsd 文件），该值指示此类数组作为`complexType`。An XML schema document (an .xsd file), indicates such an array as a `complexType`. 例如，如果要进行序列化的类表示一个采购订单，你可以生成购买项的数组通过应用到返回数组表示订单项的对象的公共字段。For example, if the class to be serialized represents a purchase order, you can generate an array of purchased items by applying the to a public field that returns an array of objects that represent order items. 如果没有特性应用到的公共字段或属性返回数组的复杂或基元类型的对象，默认情况下生成嵌套的 XML 元素序列。If no attributes are applied to a public field or property that returns an array of complex or primitive type objects, the generates a nested sequence of XML elements by default. 若要更精确地控制哪些 XML 元素的生成，应用和到字段或属性。To more precisely control what XML elements are generated, apply an and an to the field or property. 示例中，默认情况下，生成的 XML 元素的名称是派生自的成员标识符可以通过设置更改生成的 XML 元素的名称属性。For example, by default, the name of the generated XML element is derived from the member identifier You can change the name of the generated XML element by setting the property. 如果序列化包含特定类型的项的数组，并从派生的类必须使用类型，来声明每个类型。If you serialize an array that contains items of a specific type and all the classes derived from that type, you must use the to declare each of the types. > [!NOTE] > 你可以使用`XmlArray`中你的代码而不是较长。You can use `XmlArray` in your code instead of the longer . 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例序列化到 XML 文档包含多个对象数组的类实例。The following example serializes a class instance into an XML document that contains several object arrays. 应用于成为 XML 元素数组的成员。The is applied to the members that become XML element arrays. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例将给两个数组。The following example assigns the to two arrays. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string elementName) cil managed

param.name: elementName
param.span: 生成的 XML 元素的名称。

span.span: The name of the XML element that the generates.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定在 XML 文档实例中生成的 XML 元素名称。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the XML element name generated in the XML document instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例将于两个数组，并进行序列化包含这些阵列的类实例。The following example assigns the to two arrays, and serializes a class instance that contains those arrays. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] [!code-xml[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.XmlArrayAttribute1 Example/Common/MyClass1.xml#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ElementName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置提供给序列化数组的 XML 元素名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element name given to the serialized array.

value.span: 序列化数组的 XML 元素名称。

span.span: The XML element name of the serialized array.

value.span: 默认值为向其分配 的成员的名称。

span.span: The default is the name of the member to which the is assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定时所需的生成的 XML 元素名称不同于该成员的标识符。Specify an when you want the generated XML element name to differ from the member's identifier. 你可以将设置为相同值到多个成员，只要生成的 XML 文档使用 XML 命名空间来区分具有相同名称的成员。You can set the same value to more than one member as long as the generated XML document uses XML namespaces to distinguish between the identically named members. 有关使用命名空间和前缀的名称创建 XML 文档中的更多详细信息，请参阅。For more details about using namespaces and creating prefixed names in the XML document, see . ## Examples 下面的示例序列化的实例`Library`类，该类包含一个名为属性`Books`返回的数组`Book`项。The following example serializes an instance of the `Library` class that contains a property named `Books` that returns an array of `Book` items. 该示例使用属性指定的 XML 元素的数组应该被命名为`My_Books`而非`Books`。The example uses the property to specify that the array of XML elements should be named `My_Books` rather than `Books`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.ElementName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaForm Form { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaForm get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaForm value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 生成的 XML 元素名称是限定的还是非限定的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the XML element name generated by the is qualified or unqualified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否是 XML 元素名称为限定或非限定。The property determines whether an XML element name is qualified or unqualified. 属性符合 1999 World Wide Web 联合会 (www.w3.org) 文档标题为"命名空间中 XML"。The property conforms to the 1999 World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document titled "Namespaces in XML." 如果属性设置为任何值，尝试设置属性`XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified`引发异常。If the property is set to any value, attempting to set the property to `XmlSchemaForm.Unqualified` throws an exception. 默认设置， `XmlSchemaForm.None`，指示检查要确定是否为限定命名空间的 XML 文档的架构。The default setting, `XmlSchemaForm.None`, instructs the to check the schema for the XML document to determine whether the namespace is qualified. 如果架构未指定的值的单个元素或属性，使用`elementFormDefault`和`attributeFormDefault`值以确定是否为限定元素或属性。If the schema does not specify a value for an individual element or attribute, the uses the `elementFormDefault` and `attributeFormDefault` values to determine whether an element or attribute is qualified. 下面的 XML 代码演示一个架构：The following XML code shows a schema: ``` ``` 当读取架构，值都`Name`和`Number`是`XmlSchemaForm.None`，但`Name`将限定元素而时`Number`元素是非限定。When the reads the schema, the value for both the `Name` and `Number` is `XmlSchemaForm.None`, but the `Name` element is qualified, while the `Number` element is unqualified. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化的实例`Enterprises`类。The following example serializes an instance of the `Enterprises` class. 两个 XML 元素具有相同的本地名称 (`Company`) 但使用不同的前缀。Two XML elements have the same local name (`Company`) but different prefixes. 该示例设置属性设置为`XmlForm.Qualified`以确保 XML 实例中发生的限定的名称。The example sets the property is set to `XmlForm.Qualified` to ensure that the qualified names occur in the XML instance. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Form Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsNullable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否必须将成员序列化为 属性设置为 的 XML 空标记。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the must serialize a member as an empty XML tag with the attribute set to .

value.span: 如果 生成 属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the generates the attribute; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构的 XML 架构规范允许 XML 文档以显式指示缺少元素的内容时。The XML schema specification for structures allows an XML document to explicitly signal that an element's content is missing. 此类元素包含属性`xsi:nil`设置为`true`。Such an element contains the attribute `xsi:nil` set to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅万维网联合会 (www.w3.org) 规范标题为"XML 架构第 1 部分： 结构。"For more information, see the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) specification titled "XML Schema Part 1: Structures." 如果属性设置为`true`、`xsi:nil`属性为已设置为的类成员生成`null`。If the property is set to `true`, the `xsi:nil` attribute is generated for class members that have been set to `null`. 例如，如果将名为字段设置`MyStringArray`到`null`、生成以下 XML 代码。For example, if you set a field named `MyStringArray` to `null`, the generates the following XML code. ``` ``` 如果属性是`false`，会生成任何 XML 元素。If the property is `false`, no XML element is generated. > [!NOTE] > 不能将应用指向成员的属性类型为值类型，因为值类型不能包含`null`。You cannot apply the property to a member typed as a value type because a value type cannot contain `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例包含两个数组： 一个具有属性设置为`true`，另一个具有属性设置为`false`。The following example contains two arrays: one with the property set to `true`, and another with the property set to `false`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.IsNullable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 元素的命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace of the XML element.
The namespace of the XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许你创建限定的 XML 元素名称。The property allows you to create qualified XML element names. 属性符合用于创建作为在标题为"命名空间中 XML"1999 World Wide Web 联合会 (www.w3.org) 文档中找到的 XML 命名空间的规则The property conforms to the rules for creating an XML namespace as found in the 1999 World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document titled "Namespaces in XML." 若要创建与前缀关联的命名空间，必须创建的实例包含的命名空间和前缀的 XML 文档中使用的类。To create namespaces that are associated with a prefix, you must create an instance of the class that contains the namespaces and prefixes used in the XML document. 为每个设置命名空间，它必须匹配中的命名空间之一。As you set the namespace for each , it must match one of the namespaces in the . 当生成 XML 时，每个数组是正确加上与指定的命名空间关联的前缀。When the XML is generated, each array is correctly prefixed with the prefix associated with the specified namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化的实例`Library`包含两个成员的类、 一个包含书名，而另一个包含期刊标题。The following example serializes an instance of the `Library` class that contains two members, one that contain book titles, and another that contain periodical titles. 尽管这两个 XML 元素名为`Titles`，每个包含不同的前缀。Although both XML elements are named `Titles`, each contains a different prefix. 该示例还包含的实例包含的命名空间和前缀来限定的两个元素名称的类。The example also includes an instance of the class that contains the namespaces and prefixes used to qualify the two element names. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlArrayAttribute.Namespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Order { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置序列化或反序列化元素的显式顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the explicit order in which the elements are serialized or deserialized.
The order of the code generation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用枚举，以指示生成设置的代码属性。Use the enumeration to instruct the to generate code that sets the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 一次已被属性使用一个公共属性或类型中的字段上，必须应用到所有公共属性和该类型以及所有继承的类型的字段。Once the property has been used on one public property or field in a type, it must be applied to all public properties and fields for that type and all inherited types.
